summary: An Ordinance authorizing and providing for the issuance and sale of negotiable bonds of The City of Seattle in the sum of Four Hundred Sixty Thousand Dollars ($460,000) for the purpose of refunding the indebtedness of said city in said amount, authorized and incurred pursuant to the provisions of Ordinance No. 1707 of The City of Seattle, approved the 24th day of April, 1891, and published on the 27th day of April, 1891; and providing for the payment of the principal and interest of said bonds.
